org.fcrepo.common.http

Class WebClientConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.common.http.WebClientConfiguration

  • public class WebClientConfiguration
extends Object
    Configuration for the http connection settings of the web client.
    Version:
    $Id$

    • Constructor Detail

      • WebClientConfiguration

        public WebClientConfiguration()
        Default constructor.

      • WebClientConfiguration

        public WebClientConfiguration(int timeout_secs,
                      int sock_timeout_secs,
                      int max_conn_per_host,
                      int max_total_conn,
                      boolean follow_redirects,
                      int max_redirects,
                      String user_agent)
        Constructor to set web client connection properties.
        Parameters:
        timeout_secs - Seconds to wait before a connection is established
        sock_timeout_secs - Seconds to wait while waiting for data over the socket (SO_TIMEOUT)
        max_conn_per_host - Maximum number of http connections per host
        max_total_conn - Maximum total number of http connections
        follow_redirects - Whether to automatically follow HTTP redirects
        max_redirects - Maximum number of redirects to follow per request if FOLLOW_REDIRECTS is true
        user_agent - Value of the "User-Agent" request header
